```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dygraphs) # http://rstudio.github.io/dygraphs/gallery-event-lines.html
library(magrittr)
library(zoo)

reservas <- read.csv("../data/reservas-bcra/reservas.csv")
reservas$fecha <- as.Date(reservas$fecha, format="%Y/%m/%d")
reservas.ts <- zoo(reservas$reservas_en_millones_usd, order.by = reservas$fecha, frequency = 12)
summary(reservas.ts)
```
```{r}
dygraph(reservas.ts, main = "Evolucion de las Reservas del BCRA") %>%
  dySeries("V1", label = "Reservas (USD)") %>%
  dyAxis("y", label = "Miles de Millones (USD)") %>%
  dyShading(from = "2003-5-25", to = "2007-12-7", color = "#FFE6E6") %>%
  dyEvent("2006-1-5", "Cancelacion Deuda FMI", labelLoc = "top") %>%
  dyRangeSelector()
```
